ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Blade of Fiery Lamentations
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Well, I will hang on to the Staff of Writhing for when I am grouped with an enchanter, but between the lowering of bard taunt and finding myself again
ygData.messageBody:
> You will be disappointed I fear. The proc is a level 8 wizard spell that
> does 28 points of AoE damage centered on the user. Can you say
> demezmerizing mega-taunt? I thought you could.


Well, I will hang on to the Staff of Writhing for when I am grouped with an
enchanter, but between the lowering of bard taunt and finding myself again
grouping with a highly competant healer, I think I am going to like it. I am
also very glad to be able to get back to two piercing weapons (BFL and
Obsidian Shard) so I don't have to worry about keeping Jig memmed.

Proc

heh, just practicing...

;o)
Tszaaz
